name: Carrot Cake
instructions: Whisk together the eggs and both sugars until fluffy.
Melt the butter and combine with the oil, then set aside.
Chop up the mixed nuts or pulse them briefly in a mixer, then set aside.
Mix the mashed carrots and mashed ginger with the whisked mixture.
Add the dry ingredients to the mixture and combine.
Gently fold in the oil and melted butter mixture.
Finally, gently fold in the chopped nuts.
Preheat the oven to 130 degrees Celsius (266Â°F).
Line your desired baking tray with parchment paper.
Pour the batter into the prepared tray and smooth the top.
Bake in the preheated oven for about 50 minutes, depending on the size of your tray
Once baked, allow the cake to cool.
Moisten the cake by splashing or brushing it with orange juice.
Once the juice has been absorbed, spread cream cheese topping over the cake.
Decorate with fresh berries and serve.
